snippet.title: My Love for You is Evermore is Available on Mobile! #Otome
snippet.description:
My Love for You is Evermore is an otome game available on mobile that let's you create your dream love story! Fall in love your way with one or more of these bachelors: Your work rival, your boss, the accounting executive, or your celebrity client!?

And now... your celeb client's mysterious manager who's always wearing a kitsuke mask joins the ranks! What could he be hiding?

As you enter your name, you enter your story! All conversation and images are oriented towards YOU, so you can fully immerse. And you'll immerse even further when you receive texts and hear your love interest's voice on video call segments throughout the story.

Download for iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/my-love-for-you-is-evermore/id1548174371
Download for Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.LovelyInc.MyLoveforYouisEvermore&hl=en_US&gl=US

Top anime and video game voice actors have joined the cast!

Hiro Tachi, your celebrity client, is voiced by Joe Zieja, as seen in Fire Emblem: Three Houses as Claude, and as the original voice of Gavin in Mr. Love: Queen's Choice.

Minoru Akimura, your work rival, is voiced by the amazing David Matranga, as seen in hundreds of hit anime series like My Hero Academia as Shoto Todoroki, Clannad as leading man Tomoya, and Maid-Sama as the main love interest Usui Takumi.

Our newest cast mate, the masked Manager, is voiced by the incredible Kaiji Tang, with a stacked line-up of roles in popular anime and game series. Most recently, he's been known for his role as Gojo Satoru in Jujutsu Kaisen and the most recent casting of Vegeta in Dragon Ball Super.

Boss man, Kyosuke Aizawa, and his best friend, the Accounting Executive, Daichi Ishioka, are voiced by amazing and dynamic up and coming voice actors Talen Winchester and Zachery Law respectively.
